message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_ASSESSMENTTYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Assessment Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_DATECOMPLETED_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Date Completed must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_DATE_COMPLETED_MUST_BE_AFTER_HOME_STUDY_DATE_INITIATED
message.locale: The Date Completed %1d, must be on or after the home study Date Initiated, %2d.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_BE_EDITED_WHEN_HOME_STUDY_IS_APPROVED
message.locale: A home study assessment cannot be added, modified, or deleted if the status of the home study has been set to 'Approved'.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_WHEN_HOME_STUDY_IS_APPROVED
message.locale: The home study is 'Approved', a home study assessment cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_WHEN_HOME_STUDY_IS_APPROVED
message.locale: The home study is 'Approved', the home study assessment cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_WHEN_HOME_STUDY_IS_APPROVED
message.locale: The home study is 'Approved', the home study assessment cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_REQUIRED_MUST_BE_FALSE_IF_RESULT_IS_PASS
message.locale: The Corrective Action Required must be "No" if Result is "Pass".

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_PLAN_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_iF_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_REQUIRED_IS_TRUE
message.locale: The Corrective Action Plan must be entered if Corrective Action Required is "Yes".

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_PLAN_ENTERED_AND_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_REQUIRED_IS_FALSE
message.locale: If Corrective Action Plan is specified, Corrective Action Required must be "Yes".

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_IS_CANCEL_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: This home study assessment has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_PLAN_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Corrective Action Plan must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOME_STUDY_ASSESSMENT_XRV_HOMESTUDY_CANCELLED_CANNOT_ADD_HOMESTUDYASSESSMENT
message.locale: The home study is '%1c', a home study assessment cannot be added.
